name: Space Chaos
description:
This is an indie game with touches of retro game, There are 3 different and with increased difficulty levels that you can complete, then you can play on Survival mode, witch an endless mode.

The aim is to defend yourself from asteroids coming from all directions.

What to expect:

-Good aesthetics, matching the gender of the game.

-Score showing what you got while playing on the current session.

-Highscore showing your highest score.

-Amazing sound effects


How to play:

-Left mouse (1 click) to move the spaceship)

-Left mouse (holding down) to shoot.
